location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 93 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter regarding a communication received from the Agent at Baherin [Bahrain] that Bashire ben Rahma [Bashīr bin Rahma] had surrounded the fort at Daman [Dammam] which was occupied by Abdoola ben Ahmed [‘Abdullāh bin Aḥmad Āl Khalīfah].
